content: No way. Maybe it’s just because I’m still relatively young (34 next month, woohoo! Also, I accidentally typed 24 first, so I’m sure that means . . . something), but I find mortality pretty comforting. You can only screw up so badly before your short life is over! I remember Logan (remember Logan? I wonder what she’s up to these days) writing that thinking about the vast universe and our relative inconsequentiality was comforting for her. I’m pretty sure this falls into the same category for me.
